title: SHANKS STOPS THE WAR! ONE PIECE EPISODE 488 BEST REACTION COMPILATION
author: Various Reactors
description: A compilation of fan reactions to the iconic moment when Shanks arrives at Marineford and stops the war in Episode 488. Features emotional reactions from multiple anime viewers experiencing this pivotal scene.
